17/4/25 - Thoughts today

Today is a beautiful day in Sydney, it's the Easter Holiday and a lot of people are out.

Parks are full of people getting active and enjoying nature.

I'm wondering how to create a blog to share useful tips and tutorials.

I started with a static website and want to make the blog styled and easily share the same page style and headers amongst all blog posts.

Here's my TODO list:

  1. Decide how the design will look like and what are the shared/fixed elements.
  2. Create shared/fixed elements.
  3. Decide on a strategy to always present the shared/fixed elements.
  4. Apply the design and implement the strategy.
  5. Write about the process and learnings.
  6. When I have more than one blog post, decide how to write them without having to always create a new .html file and elements myself.
  7. Implement the strategy.
